pages.about: Affordable Coworking Spaces & Communities in India | City Workspaces | About Us Home Prices About us FAQ Our features Our Story & Mission We started City Workspaces to reinvent the future of work in India. We believe that work should empower people, not restrict them. And an office is more than just a place – it’s a platform to cultivate meaningful relationships. Back in 2018, we opened our first humble center in Bangalore focused on building a hospitality-driven space for digital nomads, freelancers, and solopreneurs. The amazing community and bonds formed amongst members showed us coworking’s tremendous impact. Today, City Workspaces facilitates over 42 centers nationally, from enterprise headquarters to indie creative shops. Underlying them all is our fundamental values of trust, accessibility, unity, wellbeing. We nurture local economic development alongside entrepreneurship and innovation. We provide the foundation for people to manifest their life’s work. So you can transform your dreams into reality. Surrounded by supportive communities that uplift and inspire. Uniting dreamers, doers, trailblazers to advance how the world works and lives. Flexible Access That Fits Your Unique Needs We make coworking work for you with membership options to meet your schedule, budget and style of working. Instead of rigid prices and limitations, enjoy the freedom to select a hot desk, dedicated desk, or private office plan that provides real value. With options like: Drop-in Daily Access Weekend Warrior plans Night Owl memberships for evening hours Virtual memberships for remote access Part-time and dedicated desk plans Private offices Our Spaces Are Designed for Your Productivity and Wellbeing We are reimagining workspaces for the modern world—where innovation and wellness intersect to inspire your best work. Our beautifully designed hubs integrate natural elements like living green walls, ample sunlight, ergonomic furnishings, art spaces, and dedicated quiet zones. Members gain access to: - Blazing fast internet - Lounge areas and outdoor terraces - Self-serve beverage bars with coffee, tea, beer, and more - Private phone booths for calls and interviews - Event spaces equipped with A/V gear - Meeting rooms for focused collaboration - Wellness rooms for unwinding and re-energing 19, RN Mukherjee Rd, Esplanade, B.B.D. Bagh, Kolkata, West Bengal 700001, India +91 82 4066 3113 coworking@gmail.com Home Prices About us FAQ Our features Privacy policy Terms of services Disclaimer We use cookies to personalize content and analyze traffic in order to offer you a better experience and keep our services free. By continuing to use this website, you consent to our use of cookies. For more information about how we use cookies and how you may limit their use, please review our Cookie Policy Accept Decline

pages.index1: Affordable Coworking Spaces & Communities in India | City Workspaces Home Prices About us FAQ Our features Affordable Coworking tailored for India's Innovators Our coworking spaces provide an inspiring community environment for India's new generation of entrepreneurs, freelancers and remote professionals. With affordable monthly plans starting at just ₹5,000, modern amenities, and flexible access options - we empower you to work, network, and collaborate at your own pace. Whether you are working solo or growing a full team, our coworking communities create opportunities through valuable connections, skills growth, and promoting innovation. Located in the top innovation hubs across India including Delhi, Mumbai, Hyderabad, and Bangalore. Join our rapidly expanding coworking movement to work smarter, connect with an energizing community, and give your business dreams the best chance for success. Flexible Access That Fits Your Unique Needs We make coworking work for you with membership options to meet your schedule, budget and style of working. Instead of rigid prices and limitations, enjoy the freedom to select a hot desk, dedicated desk, or private office plan that provides real value. With options like: Drop-in Daily Access Weekend Warrior plans Night Owl memberships for evening hours Virtual memberships for remote access Part-time and dedicated desk plans Private offices We Are More Than Just a Workspace – We’re Community Be part of a welcoming, meaningful community alongside handpicked creators, leaders, and change makers from diverse industries. More than just having an open seat, our members gain friendships, valuable connections, feedback, and exposure. Host your own events, get promoted through member spotlights, participate in skillshares, attend special speaker series, enjoy member-only outings for deeper connections. We nurture an energizing environment perfect for: - Solo creators to enjoy collaboration without distraction - Small teams needing room to grow together - Large companies wanting a hub for innovation outposts - Anyone who believes the people surrounding you should challenge you to go further. Join our community today to transform your purpose and potential. Our Spaces Are Designed for Your Productivity and Wellbeing We are reimagining workspaces for the modern world—where innovation and wellness intersect to inspire your best work. Our beautifully designed hubs integrate natural elements like living green walls, ample sunlight, ergonomic furnishings, art spaces, and dedicated quiet zones. Members gain access to: - Blazing fast internet - Lounge areas and outdoor terraces - Self-serve beverage bars with coffee, tea, beer, and more - Private phone booths for calls and interviews - Event spaces equipped with A/V gear - Meeting rooms for focused collaboration - Wellness rooms for unwinding and re-energing FAQ What does a coworking membership include? Our coworking memberships include 24/7 building access, high-speed internet, lounge spaces, conference rooms, printing credits, discounts on events/classes, and community networking. How is a coworking space different from an office rental? Unlike traditional office rental, our coworking spaces allow flexibility to upgrade/downgrade offices monthly plus access to our full network and community. What is the community like at your coworking spaces? Our members include a diverse mix of entrepreneurs, freelancers, enterprise teams across various industries. We facilitate community through events, classes, meetups. Do you have private offices for teams? Yes, we have private offices accommodating 2-50+ people. Dedicated desks and custom build outs are also available. Is parking available at your locations? Some locations offer limited parking - we recommend checking with each center. Public transport and rideshare connections are also convenient. Can I tour the coworking spaces? Yes! Complimentary tours are available at all locations weekdays from 9am-5pm. You can also schedule a tour online. How can I pay for my membership? Memberships can be paid monthly via debit/credit card or annually via bank transfer. Installment plans may also be customized. Join Our Coworking Community Today! Start working in an energizing, supportive environment alongside an incredible community of creators, innovators, and game-changing companies. View prices 19, RN Mukherjee Rd, Esplanade, B.B.D. pages.faq: Affordable Coworking Spaces & Communities in India | City Workspaces | FAQ Home Prices About us FAQ Our features FAQ What does a coworking membership include? Our coworking memberships include 24/7 building access, high-speed internet, lounge spaces, conference rooms, printing credits, discounts on events/classes, and community networking. How is a coworking space different from an office rental? Unlike traditional office rental, our coworking spaces allow flexibility to upgrade/downgrade offices monthly plus access to our full network and community. What is the community like at your coworking spaces? Our members include a diverse mix of entrepreneurs, freelancers, enterprise teams across various industries. We facilitate community through events, classes, meetups. Do you have private offices for teams? Yes, we have private offices accommodating 2-50+ people. Dedicated desks and custom build outs are also available. Is parking available at your locations? Some locations offer limited parking - we recommend checking with each center. Public transport and rideshare connections are also convenient. Can I tour the coworking spaces? Yes! Complimentary tours are available at all locations weekdays from 9am-5pm. You can also schedule a tour online. How can I pay for my membership? Memberships can be paid monthly via debit/credit card or annually via bank transfer. Installment plans may also be customized. Is food or coffee included in the membership? While complementary coffee, tea and snacks are offered, full food services will vary by location. Some have cafes on-site, while outside orders can be delivered. Are there minimum commitment periods? Month-to-month agreements allow flexibility to change offices or cancel. Long term-agreements of 6, 12 or 24+ months offer discounted rates. Can I hold events at the coworking space? Yes, members receive rental discounts for conference rooms, event space, A/V equipment. We offer catering and event planning assistance. Is phone service included? While we do not offer phone plans, all spaces include access to free domestic calls, call forwarding, personalized IVRs, and mailboxes. What does virtual membership provide? A virtual membership provides digital access to the community, discounts on space rental, participation in online events, member directory listing. Our features Collaborative Community Connect with members across industries to create valuable relationships, find partners, and more. Events & Workshops From seminars to meditation to member socials, enjoy perks and programming in our network. Cafe & Beverages Fuel your productivity with delicious, locally-sourced snacks, organic coffee and tea, and more. Wellness Initiatives From standing desks to relaxing pods to fitness classes, we promote healthy work-life integration. 19, RN Mukherjee Rd, Esplanade, B.B.D. pages.privacy: Affordable Coworking Spaces & Communities in India | City Workspaces | Privacy Policy Home Prices About us FAQ Our features Privacy Policy We ("us", "we", or "our") operate the website and the mobile application (hereinafter referred to as the "Service"). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data. We use your data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, the terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions. Information Collection And Use We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you. Types of Data Collected Personal Data While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to: Email address First name and last name Phone number Address, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City Cookies and Usage Data We may use your Personal Data to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information that may be of interest to you. You may opt out of receiving any, or all, of these communications from us. Usage Data We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Service or when you access the Service ("Usage Data"). This Usage Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data. When you access the Service with a mobile device, this Usage Data may include information such as the type of mobile device you use, your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of your mobile device, your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser you use... 19, RN Mukherjee Rd, Esplanade, B.B.D.
